name: Google Chrome Frame for WordPress
author: Katz Web Services, Inc.

sections.description:
Adds the Google Chrome Frame <meta> and <script> tags to the <head> of your site, giving your site instant Google Frame compatibility.

Features an options page and IE version selector.

More info:

  • Introducing Google Chrome Frame
  • Get started with Google Chrome Frame
  • Check out other WordPress plugins by the same author, Katz Web Services, Inc

License

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.
sections.installation:
• Unzip.
  • Upload the folder to your plugins directory.
  • Activate.
  • You’re done.
sections.changelog:
3.0.1

  • Updated plugin with additional GPL license information

3.0

  • Added version control for IE versions (if you want to use Chrome Frame for only IE 7 or below, for example)

2.0

  • Full Google Chrome Frame functionality, including sniffer meta tag & GFC javascript installation code
  • Added options page to configure

1.0

  • It has the “new plugin smell,” don’t you think?
